title: Selena Gomez Revealed Her #1 Binge-Watching Outfit

og.title: Selena Gomez Revealed Her #1 Binge-Watching Outfit - video dailymotion
og.description: Don't let anyone tell you there isn't an art to binge-watching. You need the perfect set-up like a comfy couch, a few friends, indulgent food, and of course, the ideal cozy outfit. Thanks to Selena Gomez's new interview with Elle, we know for a fact that she's mastered the latter. When asked about her go-to binge-watching outfit, Gomez told the magazine: "I love wearing cute satin shorts. A cute little top that’s maybe a little oversized. "
